songs.title: Oldie
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Now pops is kinda bothered cause I dropped up outta college
To calm him down, I dropped some money in his wallet
No degree, but I got that common knowledge
Them zeros on my check are difficult to not acknowledge
My left brain say my right brain stupid
Rolling with the homies and we all so clueless
Some people saying I'm a bad influence
Im just here to keep it real cause nobody else do it
You mad bro? Go ahead and hate me then
Im an alien- no homosapien
Making hits- more flavor than some bacon bits
Flow so official like a Facebook relationship
They used to say Tim, why you act so black
What you tryna' rap for, why your raps so whack
Now they wanna shake hands, but you get no daps
Walk into the room and they all start a slow clap
